title: [Self-directed] Cognitive Load Reduction-Based PBL Design for Orthopedic Physical Therapy Skills Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic physiology and exercise biomechanics knowledge
context.additional_context: Utilization of smartphone-based learning materials, team-based clinical case analysis, and practical project implementation

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain complex orthopedic treatment techniques with ≥80% precision using cognitive load-minimized materials
Learners achieve ≥90% task completion rates through teamwork-based PBL assignments
Learners demonstrate ≥85% mastery of motor function recovery techniques on standardized assessment tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
